fields.headline: About www.cardiffcity.com
fields.bodyText: www.cardiffcity.com www.cardiffcity.com is the first choice for Cardiff City on the internet. There's everything you'd expect from a very popular website including interactive message-boards and chatrooms. The site is updated several times daily and is always alive with the open message-board. The site has been in existence since early 1997 and is also accompanied by an active mailing list of nearly 400 users. It has its own match reporter as well as surveying the media for reports. Wherever you are in the world the Bluebirds are only a click away.
